head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VALENTINE, RUTH L. (NEE LOEFFLER)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VALENTINE, RUTH L. (NEE LOEFFLER)

block.p: VALENTINE-Ruth L. (nee Loeffler) of West Orange, NJ, formerly of Brooklyn, NY, Holland, VT, and Largo, FL. Beloved wife of the late Wilbur G., devoted mother of Margaret Valentine, Daniel Valentine and Roslyn Levy, dear sister of Robert and the late Arthur Loeffler, loving grandmother of six. Funeral services at the Menorah Chapels at Millburn, 2950 Vaux Hall Rd, Union, NJ, on Sunday, June 11, at 11:30. Interment private. Donations to Hospice of Florida Suncoast, 300 E. Bay Dr, Largo, FL 34640, 727-586-4432.
